xxl.core.io.fat
Class FAT.FreeMemoryManagement

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.io.fat.FAT.FreeMemoryManagement
Enclosing class:
FAT
protected class FAT.FreeMemoryManagement
extends Object

This class is used to make the free memory management.

Field Summary
protected  LinkedList freeClusters
          Contains Long objects which represents the cluster numbers that are free.

Contains Long objects which represents the cluster numbers that are free.

FAT.FreeMemoryManagement

public FAT.FreeMemoryManagement(LinkedList freeClusters)

Parameters:

Method Detail

getFreeClusters

public List getFreeClusters(long numOfFreeClusters)
                     throws NotEnoughMemory
Return a list with cluster numbers that are free.

Parameters:
numOfFreeClusters - is the number of free clusters.
Returns:
list with cluster numbers that are free. The list is empty if there are not enough free clusters.
Throws:
NotEnoughMemory - if there are not enough clusters left to support the query.

addFreeCluster

public void addFreeCluster(long clusterNumber)
Add the cluster with number clusterNumber to the free cluster list.

Parameters:
clusterNumber - is the number of the cluster that should be added to the free cluster list.

addFreeClusters

public void addFreeClusters(List freeClusters)
Add all cluster numbers of the list freeClusters to the free cluster list.

Parameters:
freeClusters - list which contains cluster numbers that should be added to the free cluster list.

getNumFreeClusters

public long getNumFreeClusters()
Return the number of free clusters.

Returns:
the number of free clusters.
